description: Allows the mob to search for a random target and, if a direct path exists between the mob and the target, it will perform a charge. If the attack hits, the target will be knocked back based on the mob's speed.
title: Ram Attack 1.8.0

baby_knockback_modifier.description: The modifier to knockback for baby mobs.
baby_knockback_modifier.title: Baby Knockback Modifier

cooldown_range.description: The minimum and maximum cooldown time-range in seconds between each attempted ram attack.
cooldown_range.title: Cooldown Range

knockback_force.description: The force of the knockback of the ram's attack.
knockback_force.title: Knockback Force

knockback_height.description: The height in blocks of the knockback of the ram attack.
knockback_height.title: Knockback Height

min_ram_distance.description: The minimum distance in blocks at which the mob can start a ram attack.
min_ram_distance.title: Min Ram Distance

pre_ram_sound.description: The sound to play when the mob is about to perform a ram attack.
pre_ram_sound.title: Pre Ram Sound

ram_distance.description: The distance in blocks at which the mob will start to ram its target.
ram_distance.title: Ram Distance

ram_impact_sound.description: The sound to play when the mob hits the target with a ram attack .
ram_impact_sound.title: Ram Impact Sound

ram_speed.description: Sets the mob's speed when performing a ram attack toward the target.
ram_speed.title: Ram Speed

run_speed.description: Sets the mob's speed when running toward the target.
run_speed.title: Run Speed

trigger.description: The event to trigger when attacking.
trigger.title: Trigger
